quest.name: The Myth Takes Form
journal: Qeshi-Rae is eager to set out on a journey.

Based on the results of Yalana's analysis, you have determined that the samiel makes its home in Kholusia. Furthermore, it employs a magick not unlike glamours to hide itself from predators. Armed with this information, you and your fellow Samiel Search Squad members set forth for the mountainous part of Kholusia known as Scree, there to lift the veil on the creature once and for all.
Upon arriving in Kholusia, Qeshi-Rae directs you to gather a substance called black aethersand, which she will use to prepare a special powder to dispel the samiel's illusion.

You deliver the black aethersand to Qeshi-Rae, who immediately uses it to make the glamour dispeller. All that remains is to release the powder from the nearby vantage point, an honor you have been tasked with.

As the glamour dispeller is borne away by the wind, you and your companions watch in awe as a herd of samiel manifests into view. The area, it would seem, is the hulking creatures' sanctuary. Thus do you lay to rest the mystery of these elusive ancient beasts. As you savor the moment, the creatures detect your presence, and Qeshi-Rae suggests giving them some space and returning to the Crystarium, satisfied that you have achieved enough for one day.

Though you have found the samiel, much work remains to protect the creatures and their habitat, and Yalana and Mao-Ladd pledge their cooperation to the cause. Sad though it is, Qeshi-Rae announces the disbandment of the Samiel Search Squad, but she hopes that you will visit again with information on any resources of interest you may come upon, that she may sneak off to find them herself.
objectives: Gather black aethersand at ScreeDeliver the black aethersand to Qeshi-Rae.
Use the glamour dispeller at the designated location.
Speak with Qeshi-Rae at the Crystalline Mean.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The View from Above.”

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: You're here. Good! Now we may set forth!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Chief... I believe it's customary to tell people where they're going, and why.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Permit me, Forename. Based on my analysis of the skin, we've identified the samiel's primary habitat.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: There were traces of salt, you see, and I surmised that, for reasons yet unknown to us, this particular creature has made a journey across the seas.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: The question, then, is whence did it come? It did not take long to determine that Kholusia is the only location remaining suited to sustaining megafauna.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: What's more, we understand now, my friend! We understand how the samiel has managed to elude us for so long!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Again, the secret lies in the skin. It contains the selfsame matter that makes up crystals, formed in such a way as to resemble glamour prisms!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Hailing from the Exarch's homeland, these marvelous objects can be used to cast illusions. Illusions, Forename!

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: To conceal something of that size takes a prodigious amount of magic. Truly, the samiel is an amazing beast!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: So, the plan is to find their habitat and dispel their illusion.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: For this, we'll need to prepare a special powder, whose main ingredient happens to also be found in Kholusia. How very neat!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: I'll share the details after we arrive at our destination: the mountainous, rocky part of Kholusia aptly named Scree. Come, we have a meeting with the samiel!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Without the specimen you recovered for us, we never would've learned that the samiel came from across the seas.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: So this is where they live... There might even be one standing right over our heads right now, and we wouldn't realize!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: So, the main ingredient I mentioned earlier─it's a substance called black aethersand, and it can be found in this area.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: If you can gather the stuff for me, I will use it to prepare the dispelling powder.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: In the meantime, we'll search the area for the samiel's domain. I'm coming for you, my pretty... Hehehehe...

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: We may not be able to see the samiel, but by now we've an idea of the signs to look for.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: All we need then is the black aethersand with which to make the glamour dispeller. Happy harvesting, Forename!

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: I wonder, why were we able to see the samiel that time in Il Mheg? There wasn't anything in particular that we did...

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: So, how fares the search? Do you have the black aethersand for me?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Yes, this is sufficiently pure stuff, and an ample amount of it besides. I'll prepare the dispelling powder at once!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: It's ready! I must say, I never thought the little bit of alchemy I dabbled in would ever come in handy... Of course, I couldn't have made it at all without the fine ingredient you brought me, Forename.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: During your short time with us, you've proven yourself eminently capable, and we could use someone like you in the facet. Might you be persuaded to officially join our ranks?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: I'd be honored.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: I'm needed elsewhere.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Oh, you would? Truth be told, I didn't actually expect you to accept. And while your answer makes my day, I wouldn't dream of claiming you all for myself. I'm liable to make lots of enemies.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: It's no secret that you're a womanman in demand. Always running to and fro, helping this person and that. Yet you manage to spare the time for us. It's more than we deserve, and we're truly grateful.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: But of course you are. Your many talents would be wasted in one place.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: There is a beauty in wild beasts─a pureness born of the unshackled lives they lead. You exude the same air as them, Forename. And I hope you never lose it.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: But come, we have work to do. We believe the samiel is nearby, and I want you to do the honors. Release the powder from yonder vantage point, and all shall be revealed!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: What are you waiting for? Go on and give the powder to the winds!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: We found more claws and other evidence nearby. We're confident this is the right place.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: We're close, Forename. I can feel it. The creature may be able to fool our eyes, but we still have our other senses.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: All those reports of muggy gusts and mystery puddles─I believe they can be explained by the samiel.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: <gasp> There!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Haha! Amazing! They're even bigger than I thought!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: They truly exist! You were right, Chief! You were right all along!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Of course I was! But even I wasn't expecting to find an entire herd, and with young besides! The island must be their sanctuary, away from the volatility of the mainland!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Curious that the herd can function without seeing one another. They must have some means of communication. Via cries inaudible to our ears, perhaps?

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: Assuming they ordinarily remain hidden, why do you suppose the creature in Il Mheg showed itself to us?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Hmmm... A good question.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: This is merely a hypothesis, but that beast, I believe, was smitten.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: S-Smitten?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: In the midst of courtship, in other words. In order to win over a female, I imagine that it must exhibit itself. Show that it's healthy and strong.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: So it engages in reckless acts to gain the attention of the opposite sex! Just like people!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Wait... Does that mean there was another samiel nearby at the time? And what do you suppose they do when mating? Would they reveal themselves as well?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Another good question. Considering their massive frames, perhaps they take to the water. But whatever the answer is, rest assured we'll find it soon enough, along with many others.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Finding the samiel was only the beginning, my friends. Exciting days of study and research await us! Ahahahaha!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Oh dear, it seems we've been noticed.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: We should give them some space. Animals with young can be unpredictable, and it would be an impediment to our work were they to grow wary of us.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Come, my friends, let's return to the Crystarium. I daresay we've achieved enough for one day.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: To behold the samiel in the flesh was moving beyond words. Were it not for you, we may well have remained ignorant of their existence.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: The little ones were adorable, were they not? I hope they'll grow up big and strong!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Brief though it was, I'll never forget my first sight of the samiel. I can't wait to begin our study of the creature in earnest!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Study is all well and good, Chief, but I'll remind you not to neglect your other duties at the facet.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Yes, yes, I know, I know.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: Well, Yalana, judging by your own excitement, it seems you enjoy it no less than any of us.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Of course I enjoy it! It's not often one gets the chance to study such an ancient life-form. There's so much we stand to learn, from their metabolism to their behavior to their society...

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: When light swallowed up the world, it not only decimated innumerable species outright. It wreaked havoc on the balance of nature, which led to the extinction of yet more species.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: That's to say, all life that has survived is a miracle, Forename. Yours. Mine. And of course, the samiel's.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: I was born after the Flood, like most folk. We know only what exists now, and little and less of what came before.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: But I believe, Forename. I believe that, one day, life will return to where light now rules. That the world will return to the way it once was.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: And so I labor to conserve the precious resources we still have. For the lives that will blossom on the morrow will arise from the seeds of today.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: We'll study the samiel and protect their habitat, that they might still roam these lands in a thousand years and beyond.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Of course, we can't do this without Yalana and Mao and their brilliant minds!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Hmph, already trying to foist more work on us, I see.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: But against my better judgment...you have my cooperation, Chief. After all, without me keeping watch, you'd go off gallivanting again given half a chance!

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: You can count on me as well! I for one am keen to see what other mysteries can be attributed to the samiel!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Well, Forename, under your fine leadership, the Samiel Search Squad has fulfilled its purpose. Sad though it is, it's time for us to disband.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: I don't doubt that you'll remain busy with your myriad other pursuits, but I hope you won't forget about us. Should you come into aught of interest on your adventures, be sure to let me know so I can sneak off to find it!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Qeshi-Rae could not be happier with your efforts. She now considers you Honorary Captain of the Samiel Search Squad!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There may be other folk in the Crystalline Mean who could use the assistance of a talented artisan. Ask around, and see who is in need of your skills.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have completed all the deliveries currently available. When you have a spare moment, it seems Katliss would like to have a word with you.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Return to visit the Crystalline Mean once you have completed the main scenario quest “Shadowbringers.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have completed all the deliveries currently available. When you have a spare moment, it seems Katliss would like to have a word with you.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Visit her at the main reception counter in the Crystalline Mean.
